data.title: Sinclair: Full list of local TV news stations owned by broadcasting group
data.meta_description: It controls several hundred channels across the US
data.text:
Sinclair Broadcast Group is back on the grill this week after posting links on the websites of local news affiliates to a YouTube video attacking CNN.

It accused the network's Brian Stelter of hypocrisy, citing his recent criticism of fake news, the topic that was at the centre of the Sinclair-owned stations' "must-runs" that caused controversy, and criticism from CNN and others, and the backing of President Trump.

"There's a big difference between my coverage and Sinclair's mandatory promos," Stelter responded. "No one tells me what to say. But these anchors were told exactly what to say...”

Last week, the producer of a morning show on a TV station in Nebraska owned by Sinclair Broadcast Group resigned after the latest promo handed down by management proved the last straw.

The hashtag #BoycottSinclairBroadcasting has since spread on Twitter.

Here is a full list, as per Sinclair's site, of local TV news channels it owns:
